name: UNavLinkCustomComponent
doc:
Encapsulates NavLinkCustomInterface interface, can be used with Actors not relevant for navigation

Additional functionality:
- can be toggled
- can create obstacle area for easier/forced separation of link end points
- can broadcast state changes to nearby agents

EnabledAreaClass: area class to use when link is enabled
DisabledAreaClass: area class to use when link is disabled
SupportedAgents: restrict area only to specified agents
ObstacleAreaClass: area class for simple box obstacle
BroadcastInterval: interval for state change broadcast (0 = single broadcast)
BroadcastChannel: trace channel for state change broadcast
bLinkEnabled: is link currently in enabled state? (area class)
bNotifyWhenEnabled: should link notify nearby agents when it changes state to enabled
bNotifyWhenDisabled: should link notify nearby agents when it changes state to disabled
bCreateBoxObstacle: if set, box obstacle area will be added to generation
